article_title: Israel's president says Sinwar was 'dedicated to terror and bloodshed'
sentence: Israel's  President  Isaac  Herzog  commends  Israeli  forces  for  killing  the  Hamas  leader,  saying  Yahya  Sinwar  was  "responsible  for  heinous  acts  of  terrorism  against  Israeli  civilians,  citizens  of  other  countries,  and  the  murder  of  thousands  of  innocent  people"  "His  evil  endeavours  were  dedicated  to  terror,  bloodshed,  and  destabilizing  the  Middle  East.  "
